thread.section_title: NZ Watch Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NZ Watch Store | nzwatchstore.co.nz
thread.title: Smith Diggle
thread.title_full: NZ Watch Store reviewed by Smith Diggle

author: Smith Diggle
title: Smith Diggle
text: Thank you so much NZWATCHSTORE for our purchase. I bought a Fossil watch for my Mum for her birthday. Your technical staff online chat were great, helping out with my questions straight away before purchasing. Purchasing was easy and fast and the product was delivered super fast (4 days). The product was also just as explained and my Mum loves the watch. I was also surprised to get a $20 voucher for our next purchase. Thanks again and we look forward to buying off you again.
